description.zh: 一个简单的 loading 状态。
小的用于文本加载，默认用于卡片容器级加载，大的用于**页面级**加载。
description.en: A small `Spin` use in loading text, default `Spin` use in loading card-level block, and large `Spin` use in loading **page**.

description.zh: 可以直接把内容内嵌到 `Spin` 中，将现有容器变为加载状态。
description.en: Embedding content into `Spin` will alter it into loading state.

description.zh: 延迟显示 loading 效果。当 spinning 状态在 `delay` 时间内结束，则不显示 loading 状态。
description.en: Specifies a delay for loading state. If `spinning` ends during delay, loading status won't appear.

node.html:
Property Description Type Default Value
delay specifies a delay in milliseconds for loading state (prevent flush) number (milliseconds) -
indicator React node of the spinning indicator ReactElement -
size size of Spin, options: small, default and large string default
spinning whether Spin is spinning boolean true
tip customize description content when Spin has children string -
wrapperClassName className of wrapper when Spin has children string -

pageContext.description:
A spinner for displaying loading state of a page or a section.

When To Use

When part of the page is waiting for asynchronous data or during a rendering process, an appropriate loading animation can effectively alleviate users' inquietude.
